text:
Came here in Sept 2024 with my wife to this museum.🌿🟨  The Changi Chapel and Museum is like a memorial museum to remember the efforts of the internees that were here decades ago.

The museum is filled with tonnes of information which we find edifying.

🌿 Above all, it is a highly educational and interesting museum filled with artefacts and useful info.

🟨My husband and I visited the Changi Chapel and Museum a few months ago in Sept 2024.

🌳  The Changi Chapel and Museum is a memorial museum to the internees and is an effort to keep their stories alive.

✅️ The museum itself also consists of St George's Chapel, which holds the Changi Cross at the altar area.

🟦  The recently revamped Changi Chapel and Museum (  refurbished in 2021) features new content & historical artefacts presented in an engaging format to tell the stories of the internees in Changi.
